title: Climate Change Data Visualization and Storytelling Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic data interpretation skills, foundational knowledge of climate change, and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Course for working professionals (administrative/managerial) composed of undergraduate university students, emphasizing social science problem-solving and collaborative inquiry learning based on advanced domain expertise

learning_goals: Establish multivariate hypotheses by analyzing climate change data and visualize them using data visualization tools
Utilize the Socio-Scientific Issues (SSI) framework to create data-driven storytelling
Enhance the ability to interpret the correlation between carbon emissions and human activities through collaborative inquiry processes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
